name: Dungeon's Race 2D Beta
description:
As a mighty mage it is your duty to protect the ancient portals. The Orcs are on their way to destroy the portals. You must build defenses to stop the orcs before they reach the portals. You can can build various Towers to increase your defenses.

Description:
Dungeon's Race is a 2D Tower Defense with RPG elements that is still in development. The players have the ability to build towers or shoot enemies themselves. The goal of the game is to protect the portal from the enemies by building towers and upgrading them. Towers can be upgraded in various way such as attack speed, attack damage and area damage. ( This game is still under development, the game-play is not as optimal as it could be, I hope all players take this into account while playing )

Controls:

  • Movement: W, A, S, D ( move up, down, left and right )
  • Attack / Select / Build: Left Mouse Button 
  • Aiming: Mouse ( character shoots in the direction of the mouse pointer )

How to play:

  • Click on the shop and buy a tower ( player must be near the shop )
  • Bought tower comes in the player action bar
  • Here you have to pay every time you build a tower
  • Towers can only be built on grass ( unavailable grass becomes darker )
  • Select your towers and upgrade them as you earn money by killing orcs

Features:

  • Building Towers
  • Shoot enemies 
  • Multiplayer ( WIP )

Dungeon's Race was made in the Godot Engine an open-source  Cross-Platform 2d and 3d Game Engine. The Game Art was made with Inkscape and Krita both open-source graphics software. The Music was made with LMMS and the sound effects are from OpenGameArt.org.

All the above mentioned software is open-source or free software to use for both personal and commercial use and can be downloaded from: 

  • Godot Engine ( https://godotengine.org )
  • Krita ( https://krita.org )
  • Inkspace ( https://inkscape.org )
  • LMMS ( https://lmms.io/ )
